pages.text: There are few things more unpleasant than one's favorite $(thing)tool$() breaking when it is needed most, removing the ability to even repair it and rendering all enchanting efforts useless. To mitigate this problem, $(item)Eir's Token$() can be applied to any tool using an $(thing)anvil$(). Any tools that have this token applied will, instead of breaking when their durability reaches zero, simply $(thing)stop functioning$() instead.
Creating the $(item)Eir's Token$() using the $(l:practices/tree_ritual)Ritual of the Forest$()
